lines.text: Well, that candle's been lit, which means...
...that there was a source of flame to light it. A match, or something.
And if he had matches, why light a candle first, then use that to set the hay on fire?
Because the candle was already lit. Slick Emmup s-simply arrived in the middle of the preparation for the ritual.
Rather than light a new match, he s-simply took the candle he'd already lit.
...Uh, you were prepared for that one?
I just have a brain, which I occasionally use to think before I speak.
One wouldn't- wouldn't expect that to set me apart from my peers, but- but here we are.
Yeah, yeah. Don't think I'm done with you!
